channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: How Music Helped Inspire the Not-Musical Stars of ‘The Bride!’
item.description: Like Frankenstein himself, crafting 'The Bride!' required a hodgepodge of songs from musicians of the past.

item.title: The iPhone 17e could launch soon with MagSafe and an A19 chip
item.description: Almost exactly one year after launching the iPhone 16e, Apple is preparing to launch the 17e, according to Mark Gurman. The iPhone 17e will feature an upgraded A19 chip from the iPhone 17 lineup, plus MagSafe charging, and move Apple's in-house cellular chips. Just as importantly, the company apparently plans to keep the price at […]

item.title: Conduite molle, écrans complexes : le vrai problème des voitures chinoises vendues en Europe
item.description: Longtemps craint, le raz de marée des voitures électriques chinoises n'a pas (encore) atteint l'Europe. Et si l'offre n'était pas si adaptée aux goûts européens ? Faisons un tour d'horizon des points de divergence, et pourquoi cela pourrait bientôt être de l'histoire passée.

item.title: Sony’s Hawk-Eye Cameras Still Aren’t Giving Football Fans the One Thing They Want
item.description: Sony's Hawk-Eye tech is an impressive feat of camera technology that changed the NFL this year, but there's still one thing fans and football commentators are begging for.

item.title: How I Built the Star Trek control panel of my dreams
item.description: One of my pandemic hobbies that stuck was home automation. I discovered Home Assistant - the popular open source, extremely customizable home automation platform - and all the intricate things you can do with it to make your home work better. I have ADHD and have found Home Assistant to be a valuable tool for […]

item.title: GuliKit’s tiny USB dongle lets you connect your PS5 controller to your Switch 2
item.description: Dongles have a well-earned reputation for being a nuisance. They're often costly and annoying to deal with, but for gamers, there's one that I love to recommend that's neither. 8BitDo's $20 USB Adapter 2 lets you wirelessly link controllers to the Switch 2 that would otherwise be unsupported, like the Sony DualSense (complete with rumble […]

item.title: Sunsetting the print server: why 2026 is the year to finally go serverless
item.description: Legacy print servers have always carried costs; why you should eradicate them in 2026.

item.title: 'Moflin had a really warm and fuzzy moment' – a week with the robot pet that wriggled and squeaked its way into my heart
item.description: How I learned to stop worrying and love Casio's affectionate AI guinea pig.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, February 9 (game #1477)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, February 9 (game #974)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, February 9 (game #708)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Amazon brade ce géant TV Samsung Mini LED et 144 Hz de 65 pouces : le moment parfait pour changer de TV ?
item.description: Si vous cherchez un téléviseur polyvalent, performant en gaming et riche en fonctionnalités connectées, le Samsung 65QN80F est fait pour vous. D'ailleurs, il est même moins cher en ce moment sur Amazon et passe de 990 euros à 871 euros.

item.title: Section 230 turns 30 as it faces its biggest tests yet
item.description: Thirty years ago today, Section 230 of the Communications Decency Act, a bill credited with creating the groundwork for the modern internet, became law and set off a chain of events that would make it a lightning rod for the techlash. The statute has survived everything from the dot-com bubble to a Supreme Court challenge […]

item.title: What is the release date for Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 7 on Hulu and Disney+?
item.description: Wrigley and Bree finally kissed last week, but what does that mean for Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 7, and when is it on Hulu and Disney+?

item.title: Une exolune autour d'une naine brune, comme dans Avatar, a peut-être été détectée !
item.description: Des exolunes pourraient exister et abriter des formes de vie. Les astronomes les chassent et quelques-unes sont peut-être tombées dans leurs filets, par exemple tout dernièrement grâce à l'instrument Gravity équipant les grands télescopes de l'Eso au Chili.
